column1: Great Britain and France waged naval war against the USA and the USA didn’t respond. What was this conflict called?
column2: Quasi War: Quasi means “apparently but not really.”

column1: What were a number of laws that limited the free speech of journalists and all Americans and made it harder to immigrate to the USA?
In which election did Republican Thomas Jefferson beat Federalist John Adams, and it was the first time that presidential power changed political parties peacefully in the world in over 1700 years?
